articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asian Stocks Edge Up After Record on Wall Street: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian equities came off session highs, swinging between modest gains and losses after benchmarks in Hong Kong and mainland China retreated.
articles.content:
Asian equities came off session highs, swinging between modest gains and losses after benchmarks in Hong Kong and mainland China retreated.
Shares in Hong Kong fell 1.1% on lower-than-usual trading … [+377 chars]
